about_the_game:
Are you ready for a journey into the depths of infinite space? In Star Runaway, you take control of a spacecraft, gliding between galaxies, collecting shimmering stars, and boosting your score with every moment. But be careful—during your journey, obstacles and dangerous asteroids will try to block your path!

Each star you collect earns you points, but the real challenge is surviving while gathering them. Use your spacecraft's maneuverability to navigate through obstacles, avoid rapidly moving objects, and collect as many stars as possible to achieve high scores. Test your skills and reflexes as you aim to break your own records with every attempt.

Success in Star Runaway comes from quick thinking and precise strategy. How long can you survive, and how many stars can you collect? An endless adventure in the unknown expanse of space awaits you! Get ready, power up your engines, and chase the stars!

name: Star Runaway

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core
  • Memory: 1000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: A spaceship travels through space collecting stars, each star adds to the score, and the player tries to beat their high score.
